objects.text:
• HAIR FALL CONTROL
• BOOSTS HAIR GROWTH
• ADDS STRENGTH & SHINE
• NATURAL INGREDIENTS

product_details.name: Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil & Redensyl for Hair Fall Control | Boosts Hair Growth | Adds Strength & Shine | 200 ml
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Item part number: 8904417310245. Product Dimensions: 15.5 x 5 x 5 cm; 200 g. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 15.5 x 5 x 5 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 200.0 millilitre. Generic Name: Hair Oil.

banner_details:
The banner is designed to promote a natural onion hair oil product with a vibrant, health-oriented aesthetic. It features a bold header ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in deep green that emphasizes hair strength. Below, the product category ("product_name") is labeled in a fresh, nature-inspired typeface. A key feature list ("features") is shown over a rich brown section, communicating product benefits clearly. The price is presented prominently ("price"), alongside a green call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta"). A detailed product image ("product_image") occupies the center-right area, and a motivating tagline ("tagline") reinforces the message.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Mint: `#E8F5E9`
- Fresh Green: `#8BC34A`
- Deep Green: `#2E7D32`
- Earth Brown: `#795548`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Call-to-Action Green: `#4CAF50`
- Accent Green: `#558B2F`
- Rich Coffee Brown: `#4D3319`
product_color: The product image uses a vibrant and balanced color palette that reflects freshness, nature, and health. Dominant colors include white (#FFFFFF) for a clean and clinical look, contrasted with deep onion purple (#7B2A48) in the product name and graphics to represent the onion ingredient. Earthy green (#94C138) is used in the label background, symbolizing natural and organic properties. The brand name blends blue (#2196F3) and green (#7DBE32), creating a youthful and eco-conscious appeal. A bold red (#9B1C2C) strip emphasizes the key benefit of "HAIR FALL CONTROL," drawing immediate attention, while the gold-brown (#B38250) text adds a touch of sophistication.
